metadata.title: CVE-2024-23744 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Mbed TLS 3.5.1. There is persistent handshakedenial if a client sends a TLS 1.3 ClientHello without extensions.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
